Package ui.drawing.layout

Class ResponsiveBorderSection<T extends ResponsiveSection>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.drawing.DrawableSection
      • ui.drawing.layout.BorderSection<T>
        • ui.drawing.layout.ResponsiveBorderSection<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of section to border.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResponsiveSection, PrintHandler, Section, ResizeHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SelectableResponsiveBorderedSection
    public class ResponsiveBorderSection<T extends ResponsiveSection>
extends BorderSection<T>
implements ResponsiveSection, ResizeHandler
    A bordered section that can implements the ResponsiveSection interface. Also implements the ResizeHandler element.
    Adds a border around another section.
    Represents a section that can be drawn to the terminal window.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class ui.drawing.layout.BorderSection

    • Method Detail

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int rows,
                    int columns)
        Sets the size of the section in rows and columns of characters. In this case set the size of the underlying responsive section to the size left inside the border.
        Specified by:
        setSize in interface ResponsiveSection
        Parameters:
        rows - The new number of rows.
        columns - The new number of columns.

      • resize

        public void resize​(int width,
                   int height)
        Processes the new terminal window size. In this case just call setSize(int, int).
        Specified by:
        resize in interface ResizeHandler
        Parameters:
        width - The new width in characters.
        height - The new height in characters.
